data.name: RTK13 - Bonus Officer CG “Liu Bei” 「劉備」特典武将CG
data.detailed_description:
Officer graphics for Liu Bei will be added.
We will use the Peach Garden Oath as a motif.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Liu Bei. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Liu Bei Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
data.about_the_game:
Officer graphics for Liu Bei will be added.
We will use the Peach Garden Oath as a motif.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Liu Bei. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Liu Bei Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
data.short_description: Officer graphics for Liu Bei will be added.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
